options.name: max-jobs

options.description: The maximum number of seconds a child process should run

options.name: force
options.description: Force the worker to run even in maintenance mode

options.description: Start the supervisor in a paused state

options.name: queue
options.description: The names of the queues to work

options.name: sleep
options.description: Number of seconds to sleep when no job is available

options.name: timeout
options.description: The number of seconds a child process can run

options.name: tries
options.description: Number of times to attempt a job before logging it failed

options.name: balance-cooldown
options.description: The number of seconds to wait in between auto-scaling attempts

options.name: balance-max-shift
options.description: The maximum number of processes to increase or decrease per one scaling

options.description: The name that should be assigned to the workers
